parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Structured Text

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a structured text containing the given image. Use [[setAttributes]] to set additional [[Structured_Text#Attributes | attributes]] on the image.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''image''' filename

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> filename: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["Image: ", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"];</code>
 
</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[composeText]] ["Image: ", [[image]] "\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa"] == [[parseText]] "Image: <img image='\a3\Data_f\Flags\flag_Altis_co.paa'/>"); // true</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setAttributes]], [[parseText]], [[text]], [[composeText]], [[lineBreak]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 21, 2009</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Spooner|Spooner]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Although there is a dedicated [[image]] command, [[parseText]] gives more options:
<code>_imageText = [[parseText]] "<img size='5' color='#ff0000' image='fish.paa'/>"</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
